de.nec.nle.siafu.behaviormodels
Class BaseWorldModel

java.lang.Object
  de.nec.nle.siafu.behaviormodels.BaseWorldModel

public abstract class BaseWorldModel
extends Object

Classes extending BaseWorldModel define the behaviour of the Places int he world. The method createPlaces is called when the world is created. The method doIteration, at each iteration of the simulation.
You must provide one extension of this class for the simulator to work.

Author:
Miquel Martin

          The simulation's world.

Method Summary
abstract  void createPlaces(ArrayList<Place> places)
          This callback method receives the places that have been created from the images in the simulation data, and allows the model to add or remove further places, as well as modifying the existing ones.
abstract  void doIteration(Collection<Place> places)
          The parameter places contains the places defined in the image maps, the user can add or modify place settings at will.

BaseWorldModel

public BaseWorldModel(World world)

Method Detail

createPlaces

public abstract void createPlaces(ArrayList<Place> places)
This callback method receives the places that have been created from the images in the simulation data, and allows the model to add or remove further places, as well as modifying the existing ones.

Parameters:
places - the places created from the simulation data images

doIteration

public abstract void doIteration(Collection<Place> places)
The parameter places contains the places defined in the image maps, the user can add or modify place settings at will. This is a callback function.

Parameters:
places - the places on which the developer can work on to perform changes in the simulated places
